attributes.action: instruct the Secretary of State for Transport to order public transport companies not to put their heating on until the weather makes this necessary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Doing this obviously adds to climate change especially when passengers open the window because they're too hot!  I think some companies decide on when to put the heating on by date - e.g. at the beginning of, say, November - rather than assessing weather conditions to see if it's needed.
